short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TIME is a revolutionary Browser extension that empowers you to own your web browsing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TIME is a revolutionary browser extension that gives you full control over your browsing experience, blocks intrusive ads.

Key Features
Block Intrusive Ads: Enjoy uninterrupted browsing by blocking annoying ads.
Enhanced Privacy: TIME is dedicated to protecting your privacy.

Why Choose TIME?
Ad Blocking: Maintain control over your browsing experience by blocking unwanted ads.
Community Support: Join a thriving community of users and get dedicated support for any assistance you need.

Our Mission
Our mission is to democratize online advertising. We aim to make ads fair, rewarding, and profitable for everyone.

Join Our Community
Become part of a vibrant community. Share your feedback, report bugs, and help us improve TIME. Join our channels with many members and connect directly with our team.
